title: Step 13

challengeFiles.name: index
styles
script

tests.text: You should use const to declare your letters variable.
You should assign a charRange() call to your letters variable.
You should pass A as the first argument to your charRange() call.
You should pass J as the second argument to your charRange() call.

description: Now that your helper functions are complete, back in your onload event handler you should declare a letters variable. Assign it the result of calling charRange() with the letters A and J as arguments.
